lore: A twisted rumor suggests that when one of Hydranox's heads is severed, it transforms into Xandor. This False God is the result of dark, forbidden rituals and is not capable of reproduction. Created from part of Hydranox's power, Xandor serves as a steward to this corrupted force, but it will not hesitate to kill anyone who dares approach its lair.
